name: GiftGenie
0:
”Alexa open gift genie”
”Alexa launch gift genie”
”Alexa start gift genie”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gift genie
des: GiftGenie is your go-to Alexa skill for effortless gift suggestions tailored to every occasion and recipient. Simply ask GiftGenie for a gift idea for a specific person or occasion, and it will provide you with personalized recommendations based on their interests, preferences, and the nature of the event. Whether you're shopping for birthdays, anniversaries, holidays, or any special occasion, GiftGenie ensures that you find the perfect gift every time. Say goodbye to gift-giving stress and let GiftGenie make your shopping experience a breeze with thoughtful and unique gift ideas, all at your fingertips with just a simple voice command.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
